english: Hey! The icon on the left is called a windturbine. Windturbines can be put in motion because of the their height in combination with the wind. Because of this they generate green energy!
It's your job to greenify Alkmaar by completing objectives and solving puzzles throughout the levels.
Solve fun puzzles that teach you about green energy solutions.
Complete objectives by solving puzzles and completing parkour.
Can you  clean the solar panels?
Howmany green solutions do you see?
That was incorrect unfortunatly, please try again.
You have done a great job! Because of your hard work, Alkmaar has become more environmental friendly!; You get X amount of coins to spend in the gamestore! Continue solving tasks to unlock level 2!
I love how Alkmaar cares about the city! it looks so green here.
Hi! The solarpanels above me are a bit dirty. Can you clean them, so they will work properly again?
On the roof of the Meent there are still 2 solarpanels missing for powering the new icecold skating rink, can you find them and place them on the Meent?
It looks like something is on the roof behind me. Is it possible to jump on there?
I can see something on top of the roof here! But I can't reach it can you?
Did you know Alkmaar is very busy with substainable energy
The solarpanels around here give power to 100 houses! Is that not amazing!

Welcome! This is the first level, called The Meent. Your goal is to greenify the city!. Search for for puzzles and solve them. If you don't know where to find the puzzles or what to do find some helpers and talk with them! Good luck!
Ask the people around the level to help you!
This arrow here is the direction arrow. This arrow will always point towards one of your tasks.; When you don't know what to do just walk towards where the arrow is pointing.

Whenever you are stuck in a level or need to gain some knowledge for solving puzzles. There are helpers which you can interact with.; These helpers are indicated with a blue arrow. Press 'F' to interact with them.
Hey! I am one of the helpers in greenify Alkmaar. You must explore this city part and find the mayor. He is looking for someone who can help him with a big problem!

Finally you are here! I am looking for someone like you!; Since the earth is warming up because the people around the globe are using to much dirty/polluting energy we need to ensure that Alkmaar is using as much green energy solutions as possible!; I am looking for someone who I can assign this task to and it seems to be you!; I want you to greenify Alkmaar I don't know all the possible solutions but for a little introduction can you please clean the solar panels which are placed on the roof to our left they look a bit dirty which is does not help with gaining green solar energy.; After solving this task head over to the other parts of the city and try to greenify them.
Hello! Welcome I will teach you the basics of playing the game.; Use the 'W A S D' keys to move around and use your mouse to look around!
